Code 
import {Inputs} from "@observablehq/inputs"

// Sample publications data
publications_data = [
  {
    title: "A multicenter study on Posiphen in Early Alzheimer Disease",
    authors: "Galasko, Douglas, Farlow, Martin R, Thomas, Ronald G, et al.",
    journal: "Alzheimer Research & Therapy",
    year: 2024,
    tags: ["Medical/Clinical", "Biostatistics", "R", "Alzheimer disease", "Clinical trials"]
  },
  {
    title: "Cumulative blast impulse and neurobehavioral symptoms in military training",
    authors: "McEvoy, Cory, Crabtree, Adam, Thomas, Ronald G, et al.",
    journal: "Military medicine",
    year: 2024,
    tags: ["Military/Defense", "Biostatistics", "R", "Military health"]
  },
  {
    title: "FDG uptake in military veterans with blast-related mild TBI",
    authors: "Terry, Garth, Pagulayan, Kathleen F, Thomas, Ronald G, et al.",
    journal: "Journal of Neurotrauma",
    year: 2024,
    tags: ["Medical/Clinical", "Biostatistics", "R", "Traumatic brain injury", "Military health", "Neuroimaging"]
  },
  {
    title: "Baseline data from the API Autosomal-Dominant Alzheimer Disease Trial",
    authors: "Reiman, Eric M, Pruzin, Jeremy J, Thomas, Ronald G, et al.",
    journal: "Alzheimer & Dementia",
    year: 2023,
    tags: ["Medical/Clinical", "Biostatistics", "R", "Alzheimer disease", "Prevention trials"]
  },
  {
    title: "Prazosin for alcohol use disorder in active duty soldiers",
    authors: "Raskind, Murray A, Williams, Tammy, Thomas, Ronald G, et al.",
    journal: "Alcoholism Clinical and Experimental Research",
    year: 2023,
    tags: ["Medical/Clinical", "Biostatistics", "R", "Clinical trials"]
  }
]

// Create year intervals from data
year_intervals = [
  {label: "All Years", value: "all", min: 1983, max: 2024},
  {label: "2020-2024", value: "2020-2024", min: 2020, max: 2024},
  {label: "2015-2019", value: "2015-2019", min: 2015, max: 2019},
  {label: "2010-2014", value: "2010-2014", min: 2010, max: 2014},
  {label: "2005-2009", value: "2005-2009", min: 2005, max: 2009},
  {label: "2000-2004", value: "2000-2004", min: 2000, max: 2004},
  {label: "1995-1999", value: "1995-1999", min: 1995, max: 1999},
  {label: "1990-1994", value: "1990-1994", min: 1990, max: 1994},
  {label: "1983-1989", value: "1983-1989", min: 1983, max: 1989}
]

// Get all unique tags
all_tags = [...new Set(publications_data.flatMap(d => d.tags))].sort()

// Create tag categories  
tag_categories = [
  {category: "Key Research Areas", tags: ["Biostatistics", "R"]},
  {category: "Medical Clinical", tags: ["Medical/Clinical", "Alzheimer disease", "Clinical trials", "Prevention trials", "Traumatic brain injury"]},
  {category: "Military Defense", tags: ["Military/Defense", "Military health"]},
  {category: "Technical", tags: ["Neuroimaging"]}
]
Code 
filtered_publications = {
  return publications_data.filter(pub => {
    // Year filter
    const yearMatch = selected_year_interval.value === "all" || 
      (pub.year >= selected_year_interval.min && pub.year <= selected_year_interval.max);
    
    // Tag filter
    const tagMatch = selected_tags.length === 0 || 
      selected_tags.some(tag => pub.tags.includes(tag));
    
    return yearMatch && tagMatch;
  });
}
Code 
md`### Publications (${filtered_publications.length} of ${publications_data.length})`
Code 
html`
<div class="publications-list">
  ${filtered_publications.map(pub => html`
    <div class="paper-entry" style="border: 1px solid #e9ecef; border-radius: 0.5rem; padding: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; background-color: #f8f9fa;">
      <div class="paper-content">
        <p style="font-weight: 500; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">
          ${pub.authors}, "${pub.title}", <em>${pub.journal}</em>, (${pub.year})
        </p>
        <div class="paper-tags" style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">
          ${pub.tags.map(tag => html`
            <span class="badge" style="background-color: #007bff; color: white; margin-right: 0.3rem; padding: 0.2rem 0.5rem; border-radius: 0.25rem; font-size: 0.8rem;">
              ${tag}
            </span>
          `)}
        </div>
        <div class="paper-links">
          üîó Article
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  `)}
</div>
`

3 üîç Filters

3.1 üìÖ Publication Year

Code 
viewof selected_year_interval = Inputs.select(
  year_intervals,
  {
    label: "Year Range:",
    format: d => d.label,
    value: year_intervals[0]
  }
)

3.2 üè∑Ô∏è Research Topics

Code 
viewof selected_tags = Inputs.checkbox(
  all_tags,
  {
    label: "Select topics:",
    value: []
  }
)

3.3 üìä Summary

Code 
html`
<div style="background-color: #f8f9fa; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
  <div><strong>Total Publications:</strong> ${publications_data.length}</div>
  <div><strong>Showing:</strong> ${filtered_publications.length}</div>
  <div><strong>Selected Year Range:</strong> ${selected_year_interval.label}</div>
  <div><strong>Active Topic Filters:</strong> ${selected_tags.length}</div>
  ${selected_tags.length > 0 ? html`
    <div style="margin-top: 0.5rem;">
      <strong>Topics:</strong><br>
      ${selected_tags.map(tag => html`
        <span style="background-color: #007bff; color: white; padding: 0.1rem 0.3rem; border-radius: 0.2rem; margin-right: 0.3rem; font-size: 0.8rem;">
          ${tag}
        </span>
      `)}
    </div>
  ` : ''}
</div>
`
